arts.ttl: RB Leipzig captain disappointed with latest draw: “One must win at home against Heidenheim.”
arts.sum: Reactions from RB Leipzig and 1. FC Heidenheim following Sunday's 2-2 Bundesliga draw were rather interesting.

arts.ttl: Mathias Honsak: "I hit the ball superbly, just like you should hit a volley"
arts.sum: Mathias Honsak: "I hit the ball superbly, just like you should hit a volley" I've had situations like this in training a few times and I'm glad that it worked in the game today," he smiled.

arts.ttl: "It was an unfortunate start" - Marco Rose
arts.sum: Die Roten Bullen's head coach spoke to DAZN reporters after their 2-2 draw with Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Willi Orbán reflects on Leipzig's stalemate with Heidenheim
arts.sum: RB Leipzig's captain faced the media after his side's 2-2 draw with Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim left encouraged by RB Leipzig draw
arts.sum: Benjamin Šeško and Loïs Openda brought back a two goal deficit for RB Leipzig to draw with Heidenheim on Sunday in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Benjamin Šeško salvages point for RB Leipzig after early Heidenheim blitz
arts.sum: A Benjamin Šeško penalty was required to salvage a draw for RB Leipzig on Matchday 23, after Heidenheim stormed to an unlikely 2-0 lead early in the first half. Marvin Pieringer strikes the penalty to double Heidenheim's lead.

arts.ttl: Liverpool, Chelsea and Man United all chase £74.5m Leipzig defender
arts.sum: Liverpool, Chelsea and Manchester United are all interested in RB Leipzig defender Castello Lukeba, though face competition from Real Madrid. The 22-year-old is on the radar of the Premier League trio ahead of the summer transfer window. Lukeba has caught the eye since signing for Leipzig from Lyon and has earned one senior cap for […] The post Liverpool, Chelsea and Man United all chase £74.5m Leipzig defender first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Man Utd, Liverpool and Chelsea dealt transfer setback in fight for RB Leipzig star
arts.sum: RB Leipzig centre-back Castello Lukeba is hot property and the Frenchman has a £74.5million release clause that kicks into gear in July which is of particular interest to several Premier League clubs

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. Heidenheim preview: Visitors looking for positive response to European exit
arts.sum: After being knocked out of the Conference League, Heidenheim will return to Bundesliga action in Sunday’s meeting with RB Leipzig at the Red Bull Arena.

arts.ttl: Preview: RB Leipzig vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
